thread.title: Mia Tyler called cops over vicious Brooklyn pit bull attack | Page Six
thread.title_full: Mia Tyler called cops over vicious Brooklyn pit bull attack | Page Six

author: Oli Coleman
title: Mia Tyler called cops over vicious Brooklyn pit bull attack | Page Six
text:
Steven Tyler ’s daughter Mia Tyler became embroiled in a terrifying incident in which police had to shoot two rampaging dogs.
As the Post reported , cops responded when two pit bulls, taken off the street by a Brooklyn man, viciously attacked his friend at home on Saturday night.
Mia, who lives next door to the dogs’ adoptive owner, told us, “I just hear this insane ruckus from next door and this guy screaming in pain and another guy screaming.”
Mia — who’s 7 months pregnant — told us she called police because she thought the men were fighting. When police arrived, “I hear gun shots going off next door. I heard at least 10 pops.”
Both dogs were shot dead. The victim’s in stable condition.
